title: Tetsuwan Birdy Decode:02 (Birdy the Mighty: Decode 02)
synopsis: Following the Ryunka disaster, Tokyo is left in a period of social turmoil. To make matters worse, the group of aliens directly responsible for the catastrophic event have escaped from the Space Federation and are hiding on Earth.
